question:
Which among the following is/ are the discretionary powers of the Governor as per the Government of India Act of 1935?
1. Appointment and dismissal of ministers
2. Appointment of members of the Provincial Public Service Commission
3. Issuing of two types of Ordinances
4. Authority of suspending the constitution
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The discretionary powers of the Governor as per the Government of India Act of 1935- Appointment and dismissal of ministers. Appointment of members of the Provincial Public Service Commission. Issuing of two types of Ordinances (i. Any time ii. When Legislature is not in session). Authority of suspending the constitution (Section 93 of the act).
